name: Full Text Group
summary: An FTG file is a configuration file used by Microsoft Help, a browser provided with early versions of Windows that enabled users to read helpful information about the system. It contains links to a group of WinHelp Full Text Search ( .FTS ) files, which store indexes that are used for searching through the text of help documents ( .HLP files) for Windows programs or the Windows operating system.
